articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on U.S. Media's Sophism
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on U.S. Media's Sophism
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on Thursday gave the following answer to a question put up by KCNA over the fact that some media of the U.S. are floating an impure rumor on the detention of Americans:
					 Some American conservative media are spreading ridiculous sophism that the DPRK has "kidnapped" Americans as "hostage" to use them as "bargaining chip for negotiations" and "human shield".
					
					 As was noted in the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of State Security, the U.S. and other hostile forces are ceaselessly and frantically committing hideous crimes to "remove" the supreme leadership of the DPRK and overthrow its state.
					
					 The recently-detained Americans are under investigation of a relevant legislative organ for their criminal acts against the DPRK.
					
					 It is an exercise of the legitimate right of a sovereign state to deal with the criminals according to its law.
					
					 The conservative media of the U.S. describe the detained Americans as "hostage" for negotiations with the U.S. This only shows its ignorance of elementary common sense on the state sovereignty.
					
					 It will be soon brought to light what kind of crimes the detained had committed.
					
					 The DPRK will detect and frustrate every anti-DPRK plot of the dishonest hostile elements and mercilessly punish the criminals and thus reliably defend its state and social system.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Gives Briefing on Situation
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Gives Briefing on Situation
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry gave a briefing on situation for foreign diplomatic envoys and international body representatives here at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday, as regards the fact that heinous terrorists were recently detected in the DPRK. The terrorists were infiltrated by the CIA of the U.S. and the puppet "National Intelligence Service" (NIS) of south Korea in a bid to commit state-sponsored terrorism against the supreme leadership of the DPRK by use of biochemical substance.
					 At the briefing, Vice-Minister Han Song Ryol cited facts to disclose that the man-killing demons of the NIS had pushed ahead a plan for hideous terrorism against the DPRK supreme leadership in top secrecy, in collusion with the CIA. And he declared the principled stand of the DPRK government to find out all of the terrorist maniacs and mercilessly wipe them out.
					
					 Since it is quite clear to anyone that another hideous terrorist scheme will be made as long as the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors pursue their hostile policy towards the DPRK, Korean-style war on terrorism will be commenced at once in a consecutive and intensive way to root out the plot-breeding centers and dens of evils in this planet, including the CIA and the NIS, he said.
					
					 So long as there exist such man-killing groups as the CIA and the NIS, the common enemy and ferocious destroyer of the planet mocking at mankind, it is impossible to expect the world free from terrorism, the vice-minister said, calling upon the honest-minded peace-loving people of the world to stage a joint action to put a definite end to all sorts of unethical plots and arbitrary and evil deeds ruthlessly violating their desire for peace and stability.
					
					 The diplomatic envoys and international body representatives expressed deep concern about such attempted heinous terrorism and understanding of the DPRK's principled stand.

articles.title: "Presidential" Election Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
"Presidential" Election Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The 19th-term "presidential" election was held in south Korea on May 9.
					 The election took place before the expiry of the previous regime as traitor Park Geun Hye was dismissed from office under the unanimous demand of the south Koreans for committing the unprecedented crimes in the history of politics of south Korea.
					
					 Thirteen candidates ran for presidency, including Mun Jae In from the Minju Party, An Chol Su from "Kukmin Party", Hong Jun Phyo from "Liberal Korea Party", Ryu Sung Min from "Parun Party" and Sim Sang Jong from Justice Party.
					
					 Mun Jae In, on the ticket of the Minju Party, was elected to be the 19th-term "president" with 41% voting rate.

articles.title: Trump's "Gunboat Diplomacy" Can Not Work on DPRK
articles.content:
Trump's "Gunboat Diplomacy" Can Not Work on DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Pok Song, a researcher of the Disarmament Institute of the DPRK Institute for International Studies, made public a commentary titled "'Gunboat diplomacy' can never work" on May 11.
					 The Trump administration, far from drawing a lesson from his predecessors' hostile policy toward the DPRK, puts unprecedented military pressure and blackmail on the DPRK, pushing the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Trump's method of bluffing other countries with nuclear-powered carriers and submarines reminds one of the "gunboat diplomacy" which the imperialist powers used in the past to threaten the weak countries with guns and artillery pieces and then impose their brigandish demands.
					
					 Of course, the U.S. made profit from this "gunboat" diplomacy employed to meet its ends of provoking a war of aggression and bringing into submission its rivals, with an exception of the DPRK.
					
					 During the Caribbean crisis in October 1962, the U.S. attempted to invade Cuba with the use of 183 warships. In 1964 it sent warships first to create pretexts for invading North Vietnam with the use of Gulf of Tonkin incident. At the times of Gulf and Iraqi wars, the U.S. mobilized fleets to attain its aggression aims.
					
					 It was only the DPRK on which the U.S. "gunboat diplomacy" did not work since the end of the Korean War.
					
					 The reason why the "gunboat diplomacy" could not work on the DPRK was the invincible military capabilities for self-defence its army and people had built up under the guidance of their prominent leaders.
					
					 The U.S. "gunboat diplomacy" was not effective on the DPRK in the past when it had no nuclear weapons. Now the DPRK is possessed of all including H-bomb. It is as clear as noonday that such "diplomacy" can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 We send another warning to the Trump administration which puts on airs after firing a few missiles and dropping huge bombs on those exhausted and weakened countries.
					
					 The U.S. should cool down its war hysteria and renounce the logic of strength, though belatedly, clearly understanding that its preemptive attack on the DPRK will incur unavoidable destruction.
					
					 The DPRK, Songun Korea, will remain undeterred and always emerge victorious as it is led by the peerlessly illustrious commander and there are single-minded unity of the army and people around their leader and the nuclear deterrence for self-defence enough to strike and destroy any provokers wherever they may be on the earth.

articles.title: 60th Anniversary of Mangyongdae Children's Camp Marked
articles.content:
60th Anniversary of Mangyongdae Children's Camp Marked
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Children's Camp marks the 60th anniversary of its founding.
					 The camp is a base for extracurricular education associated with the loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung visited the camp three times and gave instructions to spruce up the camp, personally mapping out a route for mountain-climbing.
					
					 Kim Jong Il settled the problems arising in management and operation of the camp and provided lots of facilities and cultural apparatuses to it.
					
					 The camp set as its foundation day May 12, Juche 46 (1957) when the leader climbed Mt Ryongak together with students of the Pyongyang Middle School No. 1.
					
					 Over the past years it has turned into an excellent palace and a model of extracurricular education bases for schoolchildren.
					
					 A meeting was held Thursday to mark the 60th anniversary of the camp. Attending it were Choe Ryong Hae, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league and teaching staff and campers of the camp.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Nature Conservation
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Nature Conservation
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of nature conservation took place at the Sci-Tech Complex Thursday to mark the fifth publication anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation".
					 Attending it were officials concerned and scientists, technicians and teachers in the field of nature conservation.
					
					 More than 300 scientific papers were presented.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Woman Centenarian Birthday Spread
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Woman Centenarian Birthday Spread
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Ho Ryong Je, a female centenarian residing in neighborhood unit 115 of Junghwa County township in North Hwanghae Province.
					 Born into a tenant's family in Kusong City, North Phyongan Province, Ho led a worthwhile life as the mistress of land thanks to President Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country. She took the lead in supporting the front during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 After the war she made her children serve in the army to defend the country and had creditably discharged her duty as a peasant responsible for the country's grain production.
					
					 She likes potato and bean dishes and always keeps her hands busy with farm work.

articles.title: Campaign against Drought Damage Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Campaign against Drought Damage Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A nationwide campaign is going on in the DPRK to prevent drought damage to the agricultural sector.
					 Commissions, ministries and national institutions, including the State Planning Commission and the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, are giving top priority to supplying fuel oil, electric power, farm machine accessories, etc. to the agricultural sector.
					
					 All the industrial establishments of the country mobilize facilities and equipment necessary for drawing water into crop fields.
					
					 Every province, city and county are taking due measures to repair or improve irrigation setups and have an effective use of all water resources.
					
					 Pumping and power equipments are in full operation to irrigate drought-stricken fields and foliage dressing by amino acid micronutrient compound fertilizer and growth promoter has been carried on together with water-saving farming methods applied.
					
					 It has rained very little in the area south of the central western coast and the eastern coastal area from late in April.
					
					 The temperature rose to over 30 degrees centigrade, the highest since the country's weather observation, and strong wind blew frequently in several areas of the country.
					
					 Enough rain to overcome drought is not expected in most areas of the country till around May 15, according to a weather forecast.

articles.title: Natural Bio-Nourishment Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Natural Bio-Nourishment Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A natural bio-nourishment has been developed in the DPRK to be conducive to increased crop production.
					 As it contains physiological activated enzyme extracted from a plant, it accelerates the growth of crops by promoting their rooting, raising their photosynthesis ability, etc.
					
					 And it helps ensure stable harvest in low-fertility fields or those injured from salt and sharply cut down the consumption of chemical fertilizers.
					
					 It has a wide range of utility from agricultural production to stockbreeding.
					
					 It has been applied to several cooperative farms in North and South Hwanghae and North Phyongan provinces, proving highly effective with no damage to ecological environment.

articles.title: New Books, Textbooks and Reference Books Published
articles.content:
New Books, Textbooks and Reference Books Published
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The February 16 Art Education Publishing House of the DPRK brought out dozens of kinds of books, textbooks and reference books conducive to training talents of art.
					 Among them are "Collection of Music Pieces for Violin", "Kayagum School" and "Basics for Korean Jewel Painting".
					
					 The publishing house also turned out a lot of collections of revolutionary and militant songs.

articles.title: U.S. State-sponsored Terrorism Will be Recorded as Unprecedented Setback: KCNA Memorandum
articles.content:
U.S. State-sponsored Terrorism Will be Recorded as Unprecedented Setback: KCNA Memorandum
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency on Thursday issued a memorandum "U.S. state-sponsored terrorism against the DPRK will be recorded in the history as an unprecedentedly heavy setback" to expose the U.S. anti-DPRK terrorism which invited indiscriminate counteractions of the Korean army and people and clarify the justness of their option for self-defense to cope with the prevailing situation.
					 The memorandum says:
					
					 The U.S. state-sponsored terrorism targeting the DPRK is going on at the worst phase in history.
					
					 The Trump administration, which set "maximum pressure and engagement" as its DPRK policy, is tightening the political, economic and military pressure and seeking undisguised state-sponsored terrorism while daringly crying for "removal of leadership" of a sovereign state and regime change.
					
					 A hideous terrorists' group was recently detected after being infiltrated into the DPRK by the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) of the U.S. and the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) on the basis of covert and meticulous preparations to commit state-sponsored terrorism against its supreme leadership by use of bio-chemical substance,
					
					 The murderous demons of the IS, in conspiracy with the CIA, bribed ideologically deranged persons before turning them into terrorists and hatched terrorist attacks on the supreme leadership of the DPRK by use of bombs and bio-chemical substances.
					
					 The U.S. state-sponsored terrorism against the DPRK has gone to the extremes with its dangerous nuclear war moves and military blackmail.
					
					 The U.S. has escalated its scheme to stifle the DPRK by force of arms while ceaselessly heightening the scale and intensity of joint military drills for aggression every year.
					
					 It incorporated the "OPLAN 5027", the keynote of which are various phases including "deterrence", "neutralizing" and "operation to launch a ground offensive", and "OPLAN 5029", the keynote of which is to infiltrate special units into the northern half of Korea 90 days before the start of a war and cause "contingency" through internal disturbing operation and then launch a large-scale armed invasion, into one and mapped out the "OPLAN 5015", a new scenario for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK which reflects the "tailored deterrence strategy". 
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 17 joint military exercises had been staged on the largest-ever scale in across south Korea for more than 60 days, from March 1 to April 30 this year. They were the most vicious and adventurous state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 The U.S. hurled the largest-ever special operation forces and means into the exercises in order to "eliminate the supreme leadership" and bring down the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 Involved in them, under the direct instruction of the U.S. president, were Navy SEAL team F, known as "unit of warriors who master the occult art of transforming oneself" which specializes in "operation of removing the headquarters" of other side, and demons of "Delta Force" belonging to the coordinated special warfare command called "detached corps of White House".
					
					 To the U.S., sanctions are a preceding process for state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 In recent years the U.S. has made desperate efforts to smother the DPRK by use of all forms of despicable and sordid methods, regarding the economic sanctions as a major means for implementing its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 On Feb. 18, 2016, Obama signed the "North Korea Sanctions and Policy Enhancement Act of 2016" calling for psychological warfare and "human rights" offensive to disintegrate. On March 2 the U.S. egged the UN Security Council on adopting "sanctions resolution" 2270 over the DPRK's H-bomb test and satellite launch for peaceful purpose. Its State Department and Finance Department enforced sanctions pursuant to it and independent sanctions against the DPRK. On July 6 the U.S. Department of State released a report malignantly hurting the supreme leadership of the DPRK under the "North Korea Sanctions and Policy Enhancement Act of 2016".
					
					 The policy billed "maximum pressure and engagement" pushed ahead by the Trump administration at present is an expansion of the sanctions upon the DPRK the U.S. has persistently and viciously enforced.
					
					 Recently the U.S. House of Representatives passed a "bill on escalating sanctions with respect to transactions with north Korea" and proposed a "act on increasing intelligence about north Korea".
					
					 The "act on increasing intelligence about north Korea" is to organize a "combined body" to collect information on the DPRK's nuclear and missile development and arms sale so that "relevant experts may gather and combine intelligence on north Korea and provide hard information to the policy-makers".
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the Republican Party and other conservative forces of the U.S. persistently resort to the re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" whenever the DPRK-U.S. relations are deteriorated and the situation is aggravated.
					
					 In November 2015, the chairman of the subcommittee on terrorism, non-proliferation and trade of the International Relations Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives cried out for "re-listing north Korea as sponsor of terrorism" over the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence. Furthermore, from the outset of this year, some lawmakers and other hard-line conservatives in the U.S. have called for re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism". 
					
					 Under the U.S. unilateral conditions on listing and deleting a country as "sponsor of terrorism", it inquires whether the DPRK made terrorist-support or not. This is like a way of robber threatening the master of a house.
					
					 The DPRK had already declared before the international community its principled stand against all forms of terrorism and support for it and has constantly maintained this stand.
					
					 The DPRK's counteraction against the U.S. heinous state-sponsored terrorism is an option for self-defence of a sovereign state.
					
					 Today the DPRK has entered a new stage of anti-terrorist warfare of justice.
					
					 The "Dropping and Target-striking Contest of Korean People's Army Special Operation Forces-2017" in April last showed a part of the DPRK's counter-terrorism warfare of justice to round off the practicability for the combat operation plan and further train the combat method so that the KPA can fulfill any duty of special operation in contingency to cope with possible terrorism of the hostile forces.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the present grave situation, in which the general orientation of the hostile forces' anti-DPRK moves and terrorism is to realize the "unification of systems" by creating "contingency", but continue to bolster up the war deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in one-sided policy for terrorism against the DPRK, it will be driven into unimaginable catastrophe.
					
					 The politicians of the White House, if they have an iota of reason, should clearly calculate what they may lose or gain from terrorism against the DPRK and make a switchover in its policy, though belatedly.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits at Traitor Hwang's Behavior
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits at Traitor Hwang's Behavior
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Traitor Hwang Kyo An of south Korea recently buried into oblivion the data containing "7-hour job" performance by Park Geun Hye on the day of ferry Sewol sinking and tens of thousands of other Chongwadae documents after designating them as confidential "records of president".
					 It is said that the data designated as confidential "presidential records" can not be opened to public for 15-30 years. They can be accessed within extremely restricted range only when the two thirds of the "National Assemblymen" approve it or when the chief of the Higher Court of the region archiving the records issues a written order.
					
					 With his retirement from office at hand, Hwang disposed of Chongwadae documents as confidential "records of president" in a hasty manner, an indication of his sordid intention to cover up the crimes of traitor Park and perform the "feat" of defending the "value of conservatism" that had already lost its worth and thus become the boss of the group of conservatives.
					
					 Traitor Hwang arbitrarily acted ultra vires without going through any procedures of discussion, even though there is no regulatory item stipulating that "acting president" can designate Chongwadae documents, in which he or she was not directly involved, as "presidential records".
					
					 By abusing his post as the "acting president", the traitor, not content with hindering the investigation into the crimes committed by Park in every way by declining the requests raised by the special investigation team for the search of Chongwadae, made the inside story of the crimes committed by Park and her group hard to be revealed not only at the on-going trial but also by the next-term "government".
					
					 In this regard, the political circle, media, civic and public organizations and all other south Koreans of various social standings have brought a suit demanding the nullification of the designation, contending that "Hwang stood against a probe into Park's crimes to the last", "Key evidence concerning 7-hour job performance on the day of Sewol disaster and the abuse of power by a civilian woman came to be buried into oblivion" and "Hwang has to be detained immediately".
					
					 Hwang, much upset by such strong criticism, is resorting to a sleight of hand to excuse his crime, saying that "designation of the presidential records is usually done before the expiry of each regime" and "it is illegal to violate this principle."
					
					 The recent farce concerning the "presidential records" is an intolerable insult and an outright challenge to the candlelight demonstrators and the bereaved families of Sewol disaster who punished the worst witch Park.
					
					 By covering up Park's crimes, Hwang proved that he is also an accomplice of the Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal and an A-class criminal who should be thrown into prison at once.
					
					 To leave Hwang intact means pardoning Park.
					
					 Hwang's despicable deeds go to clearly prove how sordid and impudent the group of conservatives, including the remnants of Park, is.
					
					 Poisonous herb will bring future troubles if its roots are not pulled out.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life should wage more unflinching struggle against conservatism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Bid to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Bid to Grab Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries recently announced a 2017 diplomatic blue book asserting again that Tok Islets are an "inherent part" of Japan's territory.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Thursday terms it a brigandish act of those occupied by ambition to grab others' territories.
					
					 The paper says:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' bid to grab Tok Islets assumes more serious nature as it is accompanied with the moves to distort the history.
					
					 They add fuel to the flames, insisting on their claim to Tok Islets in step with the serious situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 They offered their land for the U.S. military operation and supply bases, pursuant to its aggression policy, and are zealously taking part in the military drills for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 Their reinvasion may come any time.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is the primary target of reinvasion and an immediate task is to grab Tok Islets. Furthermore, they seek to occupy the whole of Korea and advance into the Asian Continent in a bid to realize their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere". This is the sinister purpose sought by them.
					
					 But, the Japanese reactionaries are seriously mistaken. Their scheme to grab Tok Islets is no more than an anachronistic daydream.
					
					 Tok Islets will remain an inviolable territory of Korea forever.

articles.title: It is Natural for DPRK to Bolster Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
It is Natural for DPRK to Bolster Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defence: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- China and India which supported each other in the international arena are now standing against each other, zealously waging an arms race and a campaign to win the forces supportive of them.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun on Thursday comments that such move is quite abnormal and regretful as it goes against the trend of the times toward independence, reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The reality shows that those countries with vast territory, huge population and great economic power, too, find out the best way for defending their strategic interests in bolstering up their nuclear force.
					
					 So, it is quite natural for the DPRK to launch ballistic rockets and conduct a nuclear test for self-defence when it is constantly exposed to the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 Although the masters of the White House were replaced by Truman to Trump, the U.S. administration remains unchanged in its scheme to make a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					
					 It introduced the monster-like THAAD into south Korea in order to aggravate the tensions and turn the Korean peninsula into radioactive zone.
					
					 What the Korean people came to conclusion, going through rigorous trials, is that the only way out for defending their vital rights and sovereignty is to react to the nukes in kind.
					
					 The tremendous military strength of the DPRK with the nuclear force as a pivot is a just treasured sword to defend the sovereignty of the country and the vital rights of the nation from the impudent strong-arm policy of the U.S. and its arbitrary and aggression moves.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up the nuclear deterrent in every way in order to put a definite end to the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and safeguard the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Works Introduced in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Works Introduced in Italy
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy posted President Kim Il Sung's works "The Ten-Point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" and "Answers to the Questions Raised by Mr. Manian, Correspondent of L'humanite" on its website on April 12 to mark the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included seminars on his works in Spain and Benin and seminars on his exploits in Sri Lanka, Sweden, France, Serbia and Egypt.
					
					 Taking part in the events were personages of political parties and organizations and masses in those countries.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain said that President Kim Il Sung is a prominent thinker-theoretician as he gave clear answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the socialist economic construction.
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin stressed that Kim Il Sung was the greatest man in human history as he had been deeply revered by all people for his brilliant ideo-theoretical activities, wise leadership and noble virtues.
					
					 The chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies noted that Kim Il Sung clarified the idea on independence of the whole world and had energetically worked for its realization. His feats for the human cause of independence will remain forever, the chairman added.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Il Sung is an ever-victorious and iron-willed commander as he defeated the Japanese imperialists to liberate the country and led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					 The president of the France-Korea Friendship Association praised the lifetime of Kim Il Sung as a sacred one dedicated to the liberation of the country, freedom and happiness of the people, socialist construction, national reunification and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Terrorismo de Estado anti-RPDC se registrara como gran derrota de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Terrorismo de Estado anti-RPDC se registrara como gran derrota de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo publicado el dia 11 el memorando de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea "El terrorismo de Estado de EE.UU. contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se registrara en la historia como gran derrota".
					La ACNC preciso que publica el memorando para revelar el crimen terrorista anti-RPDC de EE.UU., que causo la indiscriminada reaccion antiterrorista del ejercito y pueblo coreanos, y para aclarar la justeza de la opcion autodefensiva tomada por la RPDC frente a la situacion dada.
					
					Se transmite abajo el texto resumido del documento:
					
					Se torna mas brutal que nunca en todos los aspectos el terrorismo de Estado de EE.UU. contra la RPDC. 
					
					Al definir la "maxima presion e intervencion" como su politica sobre la RPDC, la administracion Trump endurece la presion politica, economica y militar hablando atrevidamente de la "eliminacion de la Direccion Suprema" y el derrocamiento del regimen del Estado soberano. 
					
					Recientemente, fue descubierto un grupo de terroristas infiltrado en el interior de la RPDC por la Agencia Central de Inteligencia (CIA) de EE.UU. y el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (SNI) del Sur de Corea a fin de cometer un atentado terrorista contra la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC con sustancias bioquimicas. 
					
					En confabulacion con la CIA, los matones del SNI sobornaron con dinero a los norcoreanos deformados en lo ideologico y los convirtieron en terroristas entrenados para poner en practica el plan del atentado dinamitero y el de sustancias bioquimicas contra la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					El terrorismo de Estado llega al extremo con la aventura de guerra nuclear y el chantaje militar. 
					
					EE.UU. vino aumentando anualmente la dimension e intensidad de los ejercicios militares conjuntos contra la RPDC con el intento de atropellarla por via militar. 
					
					Combino el "OPLAN 5027", que consta de "disuasion", "neutralizacion", "ataque terrestre", etc., con el "OPLAN 5029".
					
					Segun el ultimo, 90 dias antes del inicio de guerra, las tropas especiales infiltradas en la RPDC generaran una "situacion emergente" mediante la operacion de subversion interna y comenzara despues la invasion armada de gran dimension. 
					
					Y elaboro el otro guion de guerra nuclear "OPLAN 5015" reflejando la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste". 
					
					Las maniobras conjuntas Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 17, libradas durante mas de 60 dias desde el primero de marzo hasta el 30 de abril en toda la extension geografica surcoreana, resultaron la forma mas brutal y aventurera del terrorismo de Estado. 
					
					EE.UU. movilizo en esos entrenamientos el mayor numero de efectivos y medios de operaciones especiales para "eliminar la Direccion Suprema" de la RPDC y derrocar su regimen socialista. 
					
					Segun la orden directa del presidente estadounidense, se incorporaron hasta los demonios del Navy SEAL Team F, especializado en "eliminar la Direccion Suprema" del pais rival y los de Delta Force perteneciente a la comandancia conjunta de operacion especial y conocida como "tropa especial de la Casa Blanca".
					
					La sancion economica de EE.UU. es la etapa previa del terrorismo de Estado. 
					
					Tomandola como uno de los medios principales para el cumplimiento de la politica hostil a la RPDC, el imperio utilizo en los ultimos anos todos los medios y metodos sucios y crueles para asfixiar a la primera. 
					
					El 18 de febrero de 2016, Obama firmo la "ley de intensificacion de sancion y politica anti-Norte de Corea de 2016" consistente en reforzar la guerra psicologica y la ofensiva de "DDHH" destinadas a lograr la desintegracion interna de la RPDC. 
					
					El 2 de marzo del mismo ano, instigo al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a fabricar la "resolucion de sancion" no. 2270 cuestionando la prueba de bomba H y el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos, realizados por la RPDC. En virtud de ella, el Departamento de Estado y el de Finanzas de EE.UU. aplicaron la sancion correspondiente y la otra independiente. 
					
					El 6 de julio, el Departamento de Estado publico un informe calumniando a la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC segun la "ley de intensificacion de sancion y politica anti-Norte de Corea de 2016". 
					
					La "maxima presion e intervencion" de la nueva administracion norteamericana es la version ampliada de la obstinada y brutal sancion que EE.UU. viene aplicando historicamente contra la RPDC. 
					
					Hace poco, la Camara de Representantes del Congreso estadounidense aprobo el "proyecto de intensificacion de sancion sobre las transacciones con Corea" para bloquear en todas las esferas la fuente de ingresos de la RPDC y propuso la "ley de aumento de informaciones de Corea".
					
					Segun ella, se constituira una "entidad integrada" para recoger las informaciones sobre el desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles, la venta de armas y otras cosas de la RPDC y los especialistas sintetizaran y coordinaran esos datos para suministrarlos en el mejor nivel a los elaboradores de la politica.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que cada vez que se empeoran las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU. y la situacion, el Partido Republicado y otras fuerzas conservadoras insisten en incluir nuevamente a la RPDC en la lista de "paises patrocinadores del terrorismo".
					
					En noviembre de 2015, el presidente de la subcomision de antiterrorismo, no proliferacion y comercio de la comision de relaciones exteriores de la Camara de Representantes dijo que "hay que definir de nuevo al Norte de Corea como pais patrocinador del terrorismo" cuestionando el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa. Y desde el comienzo de este ano, plantean el mismo tema algunos congresistas y otros conservadores intransigentes. 
					
					Resulta ilogico estigmatizar asi a la RPDC segun la norma unilateral de EE.UU.
					
					Nuestro pais expuso a la sociedad internacional su posicion de principios de rechazar todas formas de terrorismo y apoyo a este y la mantiene invariablemente. 
					
					El ataque antiterrorista de la RPDC frente a los actos de terrorismo de Estado de EE.UU. es la opcion de autodefensa que corresponde a un Estado soberano. 
					
					Hoy dia, la RPDC entra en nueva etapa de ataque antiterrorista de justicia.
					
					La competencia de descenso y ataque a blancos de las unidades de operaciones especiales del Ejercito Popular de Corea - 2017, efectuada en abril pasado, demostro una parte del ataque antiterrorista de justicia de la RPDC que revisa la posibilidad del plan de operacion y combate y adiestra los metodos de acciones de combate para poder cumplir cualquier mision de operaciones especiales en el tiempo de emergencia frente a los posibles actos terroristas de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					No observaremos con brazos cruzados la grave situacion en que las maniobras y los actos de terrorismo de las fuerzas hostiles contra la RPDC se enfocan en crear la "situacion de emergencia" y lograr la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" y fortaleceremos de continuo el disuasivo de guerra de caracter autodefensivo.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue recurriendo unilateralmente al terrorismo anti-RPDC, sufrira en un tiempo la consecuencia catastrofica nunca vista.
					
					Si los politiqueros de la Casa Blanca tuvieran el sano juicio, deben investigar con seriedad lo provechoso de su terrorismo de Estado anti-RPDC y cambiar la politica de hostilidad a este pais.

articles.title: MINREX prepara el encuentro informativo de la situacion
articles.content:
MINREX prepara el encuentro informativo de la situacion
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que fue descubierta una banda terrorista que han infiltrado recientemente la Agencia Central de Inteligencia (CIA) de Estados Unidos y el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (SNI) del Sur de Corea con el objetivo de cometer con sustancias bioquimicas un atentado terrorista contra la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC preparo hoy en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo un encuentro informativo de la situacion para los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea. 
					En la ocasion, el vicecanciller Han Song Ryol enumero los datos referentes al susodicho atentado terrorista que vinieron impulsando en supersecreto los matones del SNI en confabulacion con la CIA. Y expuso la posicion de principios del gobierno de la RPDC de buscar a todos los maniacos de terrorismo y castigarles implacablemente. 
					
					Esta muy claro que mientras continue la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana, ocurriran el segundo y tercer caso terrorista contra la Direccion Suprema de nuestro pais, dijo.
					
					Por eso, se librara de inmediato y de manera intensa y multiple el ataque antiterrorista al estilo coreano para eliminar los antros de conspiradores e intrigantes y las fuentes de males de este mundo como la CIA y el SNI, enfatizo.
					
					Continuo que mientras existan esos organos de inteligencia, burladores y enemigos comunes de la humanidad y destructores de nuestro planeta, no se puede pensar en un mundo libre del panico al terrorismo.
					
					Exhorto a los pueblos bondadosos y pacifistas del mundo poner fin mediante la lucha conjunta a todos los complots, arbitrariedades y fechorias antieticos que frustran el deseo sobre la paz y la estabilidad.
					
					Los representantes extranjeros expresaron entendimiento a la posicion de principios de la RPDC manifestando seria preocupacion por el reciente complot terrorista de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: Elegido 19o "presidente" surcoreano
articles.content:
Elegido 19o "presidente" surcoreano
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el 9 de mayo en el Sur de Corea las elecciones del 19o "presidente" surcoreano.
					Estos comicios tuvieron el caracter anticipado porque la traidora Park Geun -hye, criminal de peor calana en la historia de la politica surcoreana, fue destituida del cargo presidencial segun la unanime demanda del pueblo surcoreano.
					
					En las elecciones se postularon 13 candidatos presidenciales, entre otros, Moon Jae In por el Partido Minju, An Chol Su por el Partido Kukmin, Hong Jun Phyo por el "Partido de Corea Libre", Ryu Sung Min por el "Partido Parun" y Sim Sang Jong por el Partido de Justicia.
					
					Moon Jae In fue elegido como 19o presidente surcoreano con 41% de votos a favor.

articles.title: Investigador coreano critica la "diplomacia de canonazo" de Trump
articles.content:
Investigador coreano critica la "diplomacia de canonazo" de Trump
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- El investigador del centro de investigacion de desarme del Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales (IEAI) de Corea, Kim Pok Song, publico el dia 11 un comentario intitulado "Inaceptable 'diplomacia de canonazo'".
					  La administracion Trump lleva al borde de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana apelandose a la presion militar y la amenaza y chantaje sin precedentes contra la RPDC, en lugar de aprender la leccion de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de sus predecesoras que sufrieron repetidas derrotas, comienza el comentario y prosigue:
					
					  En particular, el metodo de Trump, que echa fanfarronadas trayendo al Sur de Corea el portaaviones y submarinos nucleares, hace recordar la "diplomacia de canonazo" que habian usado en los siglos pasados las potencias imperialistas para imponer a los Estados debiles sus demandas de bandido con el fusil y canon.
					
					  Por supuesto, ese metodo salio con la suya cuando EE.UU. tuvo que provocar la guerra de agresion o doblegar a su rival, excepto a la RPDC.
					
					  Durante la Crisis del Caribe de octubre de 1962, intento la agresion contra Cuba movilizando 183 buques de guerra y de la misma manera, procuro el pretexto de invasion a Vietnam del Norte mediante el incidente del golfo Bac Bo en 1964.
					
					  En las Guerras del Golfo e iraqui alcanzo sus objetivos de agresion despachando sus flotas.
					
					  Despues de la guerra coreana de 1950, la "diplomacia de canonazo" del imperio yanqui resulto fracasada solo en el caso de la RPDC.
					
					  Es que el ejercito y pueblo de Corea prepararon el invencible poderio militar de autodefensa bajo la direccion de su destacado lider.
					
					  Esta muy claro que si EE.UU. no pudo doblegar con esa diplomacia a la RPDC aun cuando esta no tenia el arma nuclear, mucho menos podra hacerlo ahora cuando ella posee todo lo necesario, inclusive la bomba H.
					
					  Volvemos a advertir a la administracion Trump que se ufana de haber lanzado unos misiles y bomba supergrande contra los paises debilitados debido al conflicto interno.
					
					  Al darse cuenta de que el ataque preventivo contra la RPDC es la causa de arruinamiento irreparable, EE.UU. debera dejar su logica de garrote enfriando su fiebre belica.
					
					  Gracias al General Insigne sin par, la inquebrantable unidad de todos los militares y civiles en torno a el y el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa capaz de aniquilar implacablemente a cualquier agresor en cualquier rincon de nuestro planeta, estamos muy tranquilos y la Corea del Songun marchara siempre victoriosa.
